scripts.test:coverage: DRT_NUM_RUNS=30 MINIO_PROP_NUM_RUNS=8 E2E_CHAOS_SEEDS=11 E2E_CHAOS_STEPS=100 E2E_CHAOS_DELAY_MS=6 E2E_CHAOS_DRAIN_ROUNDS=15 E2E_CHAOS_QUIESCENCE_ROUNDS=2 c8 --clean --all --report-dir coverage --reporter text-summary --reporter text --reporter html --reporter json-summary --reporter lcov --include "src/**/*.ts" --exclude "src/backend/fileLogServerMain.ts" --exclude "src/backend/s3PresignServer.ts" vitest run --no-file-parallelism --maxWorkers=1 --minWorkers=1 test/properties test/drt test/e2e/three-clients.e2e.test.ts test/e2e/s3-minio.e2e.test.ts test/e2e/matrix-status.e2e.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage:all: c8 --clean --all --report-dir coverage --reporter text-summary --reporter text --reporter html --reporter json-summary --reporter lcov --include "src/**/*.ts" --exclude "src/backend/fileLogServerMain.ts" --exclude "src/backend/s3PresignServer.ts" vitest run --no-file-parallelism --maxWorkers=1 --minWorkers=1
scripts.lean:build: cd lean && lake build CrdtBase CrdtBaseDRT
